ingredients.ingredient: 1 tablespoon fresh herbs (rosemary, thyme and/or basil)
1 ¼ pounds beef flank steak or boneless sirloin steak
3 cups chopped assorted vegetables (pepper, zucchini and/or onion)
1 (5.7 ounce) package Knorr® Rice Sides™ - Cheddar Broccoli

cookingTips: Flank steak benefits from high heat and short cooking - 4-5 minutes per side for medium-rare
Slice steak against the grain for maximum tenderness
Prep vegetables ahead so assembly is quick once steak finishes
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can you build a complete one-plate meal that balances grilled protein, fresh produce, and comforting rice?
